@graph.name: MetaGoFlow metagenomics data products EMOBON00243 for Sampling Event EMOBON_OOB_So_26
@graph.description:
This is a Research Object Crate containing results data from a MetaGOflow
workflow analysis of metagenomic data derived from European Marine Omics
Biodiversity Observation Network (EMO BON) project operated by the European
Marine Biological Research Centre (EMBRC).

Sampling station: Observatoire Océanologique de Banyuls
Sampling country: France
Sampling station lat/long: 42.484167:3.135278
Sampling environment: soft_sediment
Sampling station contact name: Pierre GALAND
Sampling station contact ORCID id: nan
Sampling station ENA project number: PRJEB51665

EMO BON reference code: EMOBON00243
EMO BON source material id: EMOBON_OOB_So_26

MetaGOflow run id: HCFCYDSX5.UDI142
